name: node-js-typescript-express-sample
description: Example GOV.UK One Login Relying Party in Typescript

scripts.generatekeys: test -a private_key.pem || (openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -out private_key.pem -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:2048 && openssl rsa -pubout -in private_key.pem -out public_key.pem)
scripts.simulator:restart: curl -s localhost:3000 > /dev/null && docker kill $(docker ps -q -f name=simulator) ;  docker run --rm -d -p 3000:3000 --name simulator ghcr.io/govuk-one-login/simulator:latest
scripts.simulator:shell: curl -s localhost:3000 > /dev/null && docker exec -ti $(docker ps -q -f name=simulator) bash
scripts.simulator:start: curl -s localhost:3000 > /dev/null || docker run --rm -d -p 3000:3000 --name simulator ghcr.io/govuk-one-login/simulator:latest
scripts.simulator:stop: curl -s localhost:3000 > /dev/null && docker kill $(docker ps -q -f name=simulator)
